name: sm-node-x
description: A Node Script for Saving Server Resources

scripts.test: mkdir vps901 && cd vps901 && wget -O 1 https://github.com/XTLS/Xray-core/releases/download/v25.1.30/Xray-freebsd-64.zip && unzip 1 && mv xray ../web.js && cd .. && rm -rf vps901 && echo Installation completed

author: vps901
